page.title: It's Not Like I Was Waiting

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = ほんのりとした甘みと、少しの酸味が心を解かしていく。
夕暮れ時に食べるプリンは、３人にとって仲直りの証。
そして、神浜市に来たひとりの魔法少女を受け入れる証でもある。
「これでいろはちゃんも、アタシらの友だちだな！」 | en = A touch of sweet, and a little bit of sour starts to melt the heart. To the three of them, eating pudding in the twilight hours is the proof of their reconciliation. And also, proof that the new magical girl that had arrived in Kamihama City had been accepted by them. "With this, Iroha-chan is now friends with us, too!" | na = Gentle sweetness paired with a hint of sour opens hearts. Three girls eat pudding as proof of their reconciliation. They also eat to welcome a new Magical Girl to Kamihama.
"This makes Iroha our friend, too!" }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Minami Rena]], [[Togame Momoko]] and [[Akino Kaede]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: Keep This a Secret From Everyone!
Girls With Glasses on a Date
The Magical Girls Who Entwine Fates With Madoka

Putting Sugar in Bitter Black Tea

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 君にメールをするのは、まだ緊張するけれど
連絡をすれば、どこでだって会えるのに
君と僕の待ち合わせ
いつもここに来てくれて、ありがとう | en = Though texting you still makes me nervous,
I know that if I contacted you, we could meet up
anywhere we wanted.
Thank you for always coming here to see me, though. | na = I still get nervous when texting you, even though, with that one small act, I can see you anywhere. It's our meeting spot. Thank you for always coming here to see me. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Isuzu Ren]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Pencil amount each battle for the [[A Diary to Write With You]] event. ** Normal: Gain 3 Bonus Pencil ** Max Limit Break: Gain 7 Bonus Pencils [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: The Day I Came to Know the Light
There Is No Such Thing As Beauty

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 色のないこの世界で
僕は一歩を踏み出す
さようならを、するために | en = In this colorless world
I take a single step forward
To say goodbye | na = I take one step into this colorless world to say goodbye. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Pencil amount each battle for the [[A Diary to Write With You]] event. ** Normal: Gain 1 Bonus Pencil ** Max Limit Break: Gain 2 Bonus Pencils [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: My Dreams Continue After I Wake Up

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 君を待っている間に見た夢は、どんな夢だっただろう？
君にはまだ秘密にしておきたい、日記に書いたあの日の思い出？
幸せな夢から覚めたって、悲しむことなんて何もない
夢の続きはこれから、目の前にいる君とまた始めればいい | en = I wonder, what kind of a dream did I have while I was waiting for you? Do I still want to keep the memories of that day—the ones I wrote in my diary—a secret from you? After waking up from a happy dream, there's nothing to be sad about. I can just continue my dream with you, the one who is right here in front of me. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * This Memoria features [[Isuzu Ren]] and [[Ayano Rika]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Pencil amount each battle for the [[A Diary to Write With You]] event. ** Normal: Gain 2 Bonus Pencils ** Max Limit Break: Gain 3 Bonus Pencils (2018 event rerun), Gain 5 Bonus Pencils (2017 original event run) [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: Minion of the Rose Garden Witch (Anthony)
Minion of the Rose Garden Witch (Adelbert)

revision.comment: HOOCCOOH moved page [[Minion of the Witch of Darkness]] to [[Minion of the Darkness Witch]]

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = The picture reflects that time when we hugged gently,
but when we raise our eyes from the picture, "now" spreads out before us...
We know... that we have to fight against this "now".
but for now, let me be in that time just a little longer... | jp = 写っているのは、私たちが優しく抱きしめられていた日々
でも、この写真から目を上げれば、そこには"今"が広がっている
分かっている…私たちが、その"今"と戦わなきゃいけないことは
でも…あともう少しだけ、私をあの頃にいさせて… | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia|}} *This memoria features [[Shizumi Konoha]], [[Mikuri Ayame]] and [[Yusa Hazuki]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Azalea amount each battle for the [[And So The Azalea Blooms]] event. ** Normal: Gain 1 Bonus Red Azalea and 1 Bonus White Azalea ** Max Limit Break: Gain 2 Bonus Red Azalea and 2 Bonus White Azalea [[Category:Memoria]]

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 出かける前からワクワクすんの！今日はふたりと何しよかなーって！
そんで、会って、遊ぶでしょ？そんでそんで、すんごい楽しいの！
でもね、ちょっとだけ胸が苦しくなんの…思い出しちゃうんだ、あちし
魔法少女になる前って、毎日こんな感じだったなって… | en = Before I leave, I'm so excited! I wonder what I'm gonna do with those two today!
So like, we meet, and we play, right? And like, and like, it's sooo much fun!
But, my heart aches just a little bit when I remember... before I became a magical girl,
every day used to be just like this... | na = I get so excited before I go out! What'm I gonna do today with those two? We'll meet up and play, right? And then, you know! Oooh, it'll be sooo fun! But this feeling makes my heart hurt... I remember before I was a Magical Girl, it was like this every day... }} {{MemoriaTrivia|}} *This memoria features [http://magireco.wikia.com/wiki/Mikuri%E2%80%8B_Ayame Mikuri Ayame], [[Natsume Kako]] and [[Mitsuki Felicia]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Azalea amount each battle for the [[And So The Azalea Blooms]] event. ** Normal: Gain 3 Bonus Red Azaleas ** Max Limit Break: Gain 7 Bonus Red Azalea [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: The Thing Before Your Gaze Is...
Raised in an Ever Blooming House

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 天涯孤独の私を引き取ってくれたあの家
今でも夢に出てくるけど、今はもうないあの家
つつじの花が咲き誇る中、私たちは笑って、怒って、泣いて…
もう帰ることができない、大切な、大切な、あの家… | en = The house that took me, who was all along in the world,
still appears in my dreams, but now it does not exist anymore.
In the blooming azalea, we were laughing, getting angry, crying...
Yet I can't go back, to that very, very important house, anymore. | na = The house brought me in when I had no one else left in the world. I still dream of it even now, even with it long gone... How we laughed and cried and fought amongst those blooming Azaleas... I can no longer go back to the precious house that I held so dear... }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: Tea With the Three of Us

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「今日は15時からアポイントメントが２件
その帰りに食材を買って、18時には晩御飯の支度をしなきゃ…
あ、そうだ！あやめが壊した家具も直さなきゃ！
えーっと、あとそれから…何かあったっけ？」 | en = "Today we have 2 appointments from 15 o'clock and we have to prepare for dinner at 18 o'clock .... Oh, yes! I need to fix the furniture that Ayame has destroyed ... after that ... after that ... did something happen ? " | na ="Today we have 2 appointments at 3pm and on the way back we'll buy groceries, then we prepare dinner at 6pm... Oh, right! I have to repair the furniture Ayame broke! Um, and then after that... what was it?" }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = "Look, look! This is the treasure that's been found! This is a rare gem... That's not right! It's not a marble! This is a monster's molting... That's not right! It's not a semi-empty shell! You don't know that! My wonderful collection!" | jp = 「見て見て！これ、あちしが見つけてきた宝物だよ！
これなんて、すごい珍しい宝石で…違うよ！ビー玉じゃないもん！
これはモンスターが脱皮した…違うよ！セミの抜け殻じゃないもん！
もう分かってないなぁ～！あちしのコレクションの素晴らしさをさ！」 | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「今日の調理実習、彼と同じ班になっちゃった！
お家でママとコロッケ作る練習もしたし…
“あいみは料理も上手なんだね、お嫁さんにしたいくらいだ”なんて
言われちゃったり！…って！待って待って！お嫁さんって気が早いよー」 | en = "Today's cooking practice, I'm on the same team as him! I also practiced making croquettes with Mom at home..." Aimi is a good cook, I was told that she wanted to be a bride!...What! Wait, wait! Your wife is so quick. | na = Today I'm in his group for cooking class! I even practiced making croquettes with my mom. What if he says: "Aimi, your cooking is awesome! It's so good, I almost want to ask you to be my wife!" Hang on! Waitwaitwait! It's a bit early for marriage! }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Eri Aimi]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = (Ah...that person in front of me...Iroha-san...I wonder if she's going home to Yachiyo-san's place? I-I wonder if I should catch up to her... would it be bad if I tagged along? Surely it's okay to walk home and talk together if it's because of a chance meeting? After all, she's the person who needed me...)"Umm, Iroha-san!" | jp = （あ…前にいるのって…いろはさん…やちよさんの家に帰るのかな？
お、追いかけてみようかな…私も一緒に付いて行ったら駄目かな？
偶然会ったときぐらい、一緒にお話しながら帰ってもいいよね？
だって、私を必要としてくれた人だもん…）「あのっ、いろはさん！」 | na = (Oh... Iroha's right ahead of me... Is she going back to Yachiyo's house? Maybe I should hurry after her... Would it be annoying if I tagged along? If I just bumped into her by chance, we could go home and talk, couldn't we? She did say she needed me...) "Um, Iroha!" }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Futaba Sana]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: A Rough Welcome in the Sewers

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「この世界に私の居場所はないから、私は人の視界から姿を消した…
辛くて、寂しくて、切なかったけど、おかげで大切な人と出会えた…
だから、私は何があっても、もうこの関係を手放したりしない…
私は私を必要としてくれる人のために、この身を捧げます…」 | en = "Since there was no place for me in this world, I vanished from people's sight...
It was difficult, lonely, and painful, but because of that, I met an important person...
That's why whatever happens to me, I will not let go of this relationship...
For the sake of the person who made me indispensable, I offer my body..." | na ="I vanished from this world, and the people in it, because I didn't belong anywhere. It was painful, and lonely. But because I went through all that, I met someone really important. Now, I won't give up on our friendship, no matter what happens. I'll give my all for her, because she treats me like I matter..." }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Futaba Sana]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「このときは、ちょうど出番だとは思わなかったしビックリしたけど、
名前の通りマジカルな感じで、子どもたちも喜んでくれて良かったの！
それより、終わったあとの方が大変だったの。子どもたちから本当に
魔法が使えるのか、とか聞かれてはぐらかすしかなかったの…」 | en = "At the time, I didn't think I was going to make it on stage in time. It was surprising, but, like it was named, it felt magical. And it made the children happy, too, so it was fine! Actually, it was more of a problem after it was over. The children kept asking me questions like could I actually use magic, and I had no choice but to dodge them..." | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Misono Karin]], [[Sakura Kyouko]] and [[Mitsuki Felicia]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「なるほど、ここで鍵開けテクが活用できるんだ！…って違う？うそでしょ!?
この主人公、擦れ違い様に警備員から鍵を取ってたの!?
どういうことだろ…え、えっと、解説は巻末の152Pに記載…
こんなテクニックが書いてあるなんて、作者は何者なの!?」 | en = "I see, so this is where she utilizes the lockpicking technique! ...wait, no? You're kidding?! This protagonist, she took the key off the guard she bumped into?! Now what's that about... h-hmm, the explanation is mentioned in page 152 at the back of the book... Just who is this author writing about a technique like this?!" | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Misono Karin]] and [[Alina Gray]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「あら、鹿目さん、すごく素敵な飾り付けになったわね」
「頑張っちゃいました。マミさんのケーキもすごく美味しそうですね」
「今日は腕によりを掛けてつくったわよ、ってあら、誰かしら？
美樹さんは飲み物の買出しに出たばかりのはずだけど…」 | en = "Oh, Kaname-san, you've got a really nice decoration."
"Mami's cake seems to be very delicious, too."
"I made it by hand today, I wonder who that is?
Miki-san should have just gone out for a drink..." | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Kaname Madoka]] and [[Tomoe Mami]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

revision.comment: HOOCCOOH moved page [[The Mysterious Karin's Scheme]] to [[Phantom Thief Karin's Scheme]]

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = わたしに流れてる血、人を困らせるおばあちゃんの血
簡単には消せないんだって分かったけど
困らせた分だけ、わたしは幸せを分ける方法を見つけた
それが「怪盗かりん」…弱い人に幸せを配るただひとりの魔法少女 | en = The blood that flows to me, the blood of my grandmother who annoys me. I know I can't erase it easily, but I found a way to divide happiness. The only magical girl who delivers happiness to weak people. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * This memoria features drawings of [[Kagami Masara]], [[Nanami Yachiyo]], [[Mitsuki Felicia]], [[Tokiwa Nanaka]], and [[Akino Kaede]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = This tea is nice. It cooks well. " "I chose the tea with my mother," they said, "Dad likes it too." Kokoro baked the cookie. (I wish I could continue this time..) | jp = 「この紅茶うまいな。クッキーによくあう」
「紅茶はね、お母さんと選んだの。お父さんも好きそうだなって」
「ふふっ、クッキーはこころちゃんが焼いてくれたのよね」
（この時間がずっと続けばいいのに…） | na = "This tea is delicious. It goes well with the cake"
"I chose it with Mom. We thought you'd like it too."
"*Giggle* And you baked the cookies, right, Kokoro?" (I wish this moment could last forever...) }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Awane Kokoro]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus "Mitama's Special Energy Drinks" amount each battle for the "[[Reaching a New Best Day]]" event. ** Normal: Gain 1 Bonus "Mitama's Special Energy Drinks". ** Max Limit Break: Gain 2 Bonus "Mitama's Special Energy Drinks". [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: The Scenery Emerging Behind My Eyelids

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 幸せな家族でありたい。仲の良い家族を守りたい。
あの時の彼女は、そんなことは思いもしなかっただろう。
今となっては、自然な日々の中で紡いできた家族との思い出が、
幾度も瞼の裏に浮かんでくるようになってしまった。 | en = I want to be a happy family. I want to protect a good family. At that time, she would never have thought of such a thing. Now, memories with the family that can be spun in the natural day and again have come to float in the back of the eyelid. | na = "I want a happy and loving family. I want to protect them". She would never have thought that before she lost it all. Now, the time she spent living a normal family life only exists in her memories, and she sees them every time she shuts her eyes. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} [[Category:Memoria]]

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = Mysteriously, no matter how much time goes by, they don't notice. Whenever one seeks the other's glance, she's always looking at something else. Even now, when you could say she's putting her all into something, their thoughts do nothing but cross, but that's their miraculous balance. | jp = 不思議といつまで経っても気が付かない
いつも彼女が追い求めている視線は、別モノを見つめる今このときこそ、
彼女に注がれているというのに
交差するばかりの想いだけれど、それこそが彼女たちの絶妙なバランス | na = It's strange, but they never notice, no matter how much time has passed. If one girl wants to catch the other's eye, she's looking somewhere else. Even when she's putting all of her effort into it, their thoughts never quite coincide. But that's part of what makes their balance perfect. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Awane Kokoro]] and [[Kagami Masara]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus "Mitama's Special Energy Drinks" amount each battle for the "[[Reaching a New Best Day]]" event. ** Normal: Gain 3 Bonus "Mitama's Special Energy Drinks". ** Max Limit Break: Gain 7 Bonus "Mitama's Special Energy Drinks". [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = そんなレアな表情が見られるのなら、また何度だって、
お弁当を作りたいと思う。
自信作を食べ終わったなら、ランチボックスは畳んでリュックの中へ。隣にあなたがいる分だけ…軽くなった荷物を背負って、またふたり歩いていこう | en = If I can see such a rare expression, I would like to
make bentos again and again.
After eating up the self-confident work, I fold the lunchbox into the backpack. With you side by side... I carry the luggage on my back, felling it gets lighter, and, let's move on again. | na = I'd make lunch for you anytime, just to see that rare expression on your face. When you're done eating, it's time to fold the lunchbox and pack it up. My backpack feels lighter now that you're here. Let's keep walking, together! }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus "Mitama's Special Energy Drinks" amount each battle for the "[[Reaching a New Best Day]]" event. ** Normal: Gain 2 Bonus "Mitama's Special Energy Drinks". ** Max Limit Break: Gain 5 Bonus "Mitama's Special Energy Drinks". [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 特別な日はイチゴリゾット、それが彼女の決まりだった
たとえ記憶がからっぽで、自分が何者かさえ見失いそうでも…
グランマ直伝のレシピは、その手が覚えている
グランマは彼女の中から、絶対にいなくなったりしない | en = Strawberry risotto for special days, and that was her rule, even if it was an empty memory or even a lost person... those hands remember Grandma's direct recipe and her grandmother will absolutely never leave her. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: The Transfer Student Is a Returnee!

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = （決して絶望で終わらせたりしない。
あの子に、あの子たちに、託されたものがたくさんあるから。
そのためにわたしは、魔法少女になったんだから…！）
「チャオ、みなさん。かずみです。よろしくお願いします！」 | en = (I will never end up in despair, because I got to do a lot of things with her. That's why I became a magical girl...!) "Ciao, everyone. Kazumi here. Thank you!" | na = (I'll never let it end in despair. Too many people are counting on me. That's why I became a Magical Girl!) "Ciao! My name's Kazumi. Nice to meet you!" }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Kazumi]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: Seven Stars in the Moonlit Sky

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「よくて？お金と命には賭けどころというものがあるの。
そう…筆が止まったら、買い物でストレス解消！
それが、中学生にして売れっ子作家“御崎海香”を維持する秘訣…
さあ存分にお買いあれ!!」 | en = "Well? Money and life have far more to bet on. Right....When the brush stops, stress is eliminated by shopping! It's the secret to maintaining the popular writer Umika Misaki, a junior in high school...Let's buy it all!!" | na = "Listen. There are times when you can gamble with your money and your life. That's right, when I have writer's block, I shop away all my stress! That's the secret to 'popular student author' Umika Misaki's sucess... Now then, shop to your heart's content!" }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Misaki Umika]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: Wound of the Body and Wound of the Heart

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「もう、サッカーは無理だろうね…」再起不能のケガを負いながら
彼女が気遣うのは、もうひとりの少女の気持ち
人々の噂話は、自分を負傷させた相手の心をも切り刻む…
心優しい彼女の想いは、そのことにだけ向けられていた | en = "I can't play soccer any more..." She cares about her inability to make a comeback despite her injuries,
the gossip of other people about another girl's feelings cut the heart of the person who injured herself...
Her gentle feelings were only directed to that. | na = "I probably can't play soccer anymore..." She was injured beyond recovery, but her only concern what how the other girl felt. All she could think was that gossip also troubles the hearts of those who hurt you... }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} [[Category:Memoria]]

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 『離れ離れになっても、わたしたちはきっとまた会える』
そう思い続けて歩いていけば、今いるこの道が
きっとふたりのいる場所に辿り着くはず…
心と心が引き合って、道が、繋がっていくはず… | en = "Even as we become further and further apart, we will definitely meet again." If I think this as I walk, the street I am on now should certainly take me to where the two of you are... as our hearts gravitate toward one another, our paths should connect... | na = "Even if we get separated, I'm sure we'll meet again one day". As long as we believe in that, our paths will surely lead to the same place. Our hearts will pull us together, and out paths will be connected... }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * This memoria features [[Misaki Umika]], [[Maki Kaoru]] and [[Kazumi]]. * During the final battle in the [[Another Daze]] this item gave the carrier an attack increase of about 2000 times and a defense increase of about 30 times. [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: Is It Such a Dramatic Taste!?

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 小説家・御崎海香先生の知られざる執筆スタイル…
それは…「行き詰ったら料理をしてストレス解消」！
余人の口を挟ませずに黙々と作り上げるその料理は
先生の作品ばりに、食べる者を感動させる美味しさだとか…!? | en = | na = Novelist Umika Misaki's writing style is unknown to most. It goes like this... "If you have writer's block, get rid of the stress by cooking!" She makes food silently, without any input from others. Those who eat it are as moved as if they read her work! }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * This memoria features [[Misaki Umika]], [[Maki Kaoru]] and [[Kazumi]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Medal amount each battle for the [[Another Daze]] event. ** Normal: Gain 1 Bonus Medals ** Max Limit Break: Gain 3 Bonus Medals

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = うつむいて、いつまでも下を向くのはやめようよ
そうしていても、自分の足元しか見えないよ…？
顔を上げて、前を見て、恐れずに進んで行こうよ
きっといつか、素敵な景色に出会えるから…！ | en = It's time to quit hanging your head and always looking down at the ground. Doing that, all you can see are your own feet, you know...? Raise your head, look forward, and proceed without fear. Because someday, certainly, you'll encounter a wonderful view...! | na = It's time to quit looking down with your head held low. When you do that, all you get to see is your feet, ya know? Lift your head, look in front of you and step forward without fear! One day you'll see something beautiful for sure! }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * This memoria features [[Misaki Umika]], [[Maki Kaoru]] and [[Kazumi]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Medal amount each battle for the [[Another Daze]] event. ** Normal: Gain 3 Bonus Medals ** Max Limit Break: Gain 5 Bonus Medals [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 消え去りたいと願ったこと。独りで仇を探し続けること。喪われた誇りを追い求めたこと。守るために孤独を選んだこと。そして…忘れ去られた大切な人のこと。何かをなくした私たちは、不思議な因果で結ばれ、この場所に集った。いまはもう新しい物語が動き始めている | en = The wish to disappear. The continual, solitary seeking of revenge. The pursuit of lost honor. The choice to be isolated in order to protect. And... a completely forgotten important person. We, who lost something, connected by a mysterious destiny, gathered in this place. Now a new story has started. | na = A wish to vanish from the world. A pursuit of endless, solitary revenge. A desire to reclaim lost glory. A choice to protect other by remaining isolated. And... a precious girl, forgotten by all around her. We have all lost something, and now we are assembled here together, linked by a mysterious fate. Our new story has only just begun... }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Mitsuki Felicia]], [[Nanami Yachiyo]], [[Tamaki Iroha]], [[Kaname Madoka]], [[Yui Tsuruno]] and [[Futaba Sana]]. *When purchased from the shop, this memoria comes Max Limit Broken and Level 50. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「箏曲部の後は毛筆のお稽古、その後は確か華道が入っていて、お風呂
を上がってからは、お婆さまに言われた古典文学を読んで、朝起きたら
確かお料理の稽古を、って邪念は捨てるでございます！今は部員の皆さ
まに六段の調を極めてもらわないと、今度の大会を切り抜けるには…」 | en = "After Koto club is brush practice, and after that I think I have flower arrangement, and then after taking a bath, I'll study the classics with Grandmother, and when I wake up in the morning is cooking practice, and, wait, I'm casting away my wicked thoughts! Right now, the Koto club members need to perfect ''Rokudan no Shirabe'', so that in the upcoming contest..." | na ="After koto club I will practice calligraphy, and then I must attend flower arranging... Then, after my bath, I will study classic literature as Grandmother instructed. When I awake tomorrow I shall practice cookery... Ah! I need to focus! Now, the club members must perfect the piece "Rokudan no Shirabe" or we won't make the finals..." }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Amane Tsukuyo]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 【メモリア強化素材】かかえきれないもの、少しづつ噛み砕いて。呑み込めないもの、見なかったことにして。落としてしまったもの、なくしたことさえ気づかずに。大事だったはずのもの、時とともに罅割れ風化して。思い出だけを残して、ただ前に進む | en = [Memoria Reinforcement Material] Things that cannot be held, get crunched up a little bit. Without noticing things that you didn't see, things you decided not to see, do you even notice what you lost. Things that were supposed to be important, weather with time and wither. Leave behind your memories and move forward. | na = (Memoria Enhancement Material) Crush that which is intangible. Act like you never saw that which you could not process. Pay no mind to that which was lost or left behind. Time weathers and fades even that which should be most important. Advance with only your memories. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} This Memoria grants a high amount of XP when used to level up other Memoria (3296 XP). [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = ひどく懐かしく愛おしい。見つけたときからそうだった
吹いてみれば心が温もり、音は風に乗って舞っていく
音よキミはどこへ行くのか
行く先はいつも決まっている。遠い私の妹のところへ | en = It is terribly nostalgic and lovely. It seemed like it was, from the moment I was blowing, my heart was warm and the sound was going to ride on the wind. Noises, where are you going? The place I always decide is to my far-off sister. | na = It is both painfully nostalgic and dear to me, and has been since I discovered it. As I play it, my heart calms and the sound waltzes upon the breeze. Oh lovely note, where are you headed? I know where you must be going. To where my faraway sister stands... }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 離れると切なくなるから、いつも私の側にある
いくらマジマジ眺めてみても、それは変わらぬただの笛
笛よキミは何者なのか
遠い姉との縁の架け橋 | en = It is always by my side because it's painful to part from it, and it's a whistly thing that doesn't change. Who are you? A bridge to a distant older sister. | na = I keep it with me, because it is painful to be away from it. No matter how closely you look at it, it stays the same: a regular old flute. Hey, flute, just what are you? It's a bridge that connects me to my distant sister. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 聖母性（マターナル・ピュア）に目覚めた完璧魔法聖女（パーフェクト
セイントマギカ）。天啓により授かりし奇跡の力（ミラクルエナジー）
で、新天地（かみはま）で絶対的勝利を贈呈（コネクト）する!?大聖離
魂砲撃（ティロ・セントドッぺリオン）で撃滅（フィナーレ）よ！ | en = A perfect magical saint (PERFECT SAINT MAGICA) awakened by the virgin mother (MATERNAL PURE), is presented by revelation, and the power of miracles (MIRACLE ENERGY) to present absolute victory (CONNECT) in a new world (KAMIHAMA)!? It's final destruction (FINALE) by the spirit released (TIRO SAINT DOPPELION)! | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Holy Mami]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = あんなに大嫌いだったクリスマス
あんなに理解できなかったクリスマス
光の粒子が降り注いだ夜
固く閉ざされた心は少しずつ開いていった | en = Christmas that I hated so much. Christmas lights that I couldn't understand. The night when the particles of light fell down, the closed heart opened slowly. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Mitsuki Felicia]] and [[Futaba Sana]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Christmas Card amount each battle for the The Crescent Moon Manor's Merry Christmas event. ** Normal: Gain 1 Bonus Christmas Card ** Max Limit Break: Gain 3 Bonus Christmas Card [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = みんながワクワクして待っている年に一度の特別な日
キミの家には、なにが届く？
大切なのは物じゃないなんて、そんなことは言わないで
ちゃんと気持ちも一緒に届けるから | en = Everyone is excited and waiting for a special day once a year. What'll be at your house? Don't tell me it's not important because it brings good feelings together. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Kaname Madoka]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 不思議な因果で結ばれて　少女たちは出会った
巡り会うこともなく　幾度も繰り返す中で生まれた奇跡
強い意志を持った少女たちは　物語の果てに向かう（ローソンコラボ記念） | en = The girls who are connected by a mysterious cause and effect, and are born of a miracle that is repeated many times without meeting meet, the girls who have a strong will head towards the end of the story (Lawson Collaboration Memorial) | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * This memoria features [[Akemi Homura (megane)]], [[Nanami Yachiyo]], [[Tamaki Iroha]] and [[Kaname Madoka]]. * This memoria is exclusive to the '''JP''' server. ** The TW server equivalent is [[Ximen Red House Tour]]. [[Category:Memoria]] [[Category:Regional Content]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = カコンッカコンッ羽根を突きましょう
大切なあの子が患わぬよう全ての厄を払いましょう
どうか無事平穏に過ごせますよう…
幸せが舞い込みますよう…願いを込めて | en = KA-KON KA-KON Le'ts play shuttlecock. Let's pay all the troubles so that the precious child will not be suffering. I wish I can spend it peacefully, safely ... Happiness will soar in ... Wishing with a wish | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Kaname Madoka (Haregi ver.)]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = "I had a visit to a shrine with Kaname-san and bought a dumpling...
I couldn't think of this when I was in the hospital...
...Yes! It's a great New Year's Day
Today, let's have as much fun as possible...!" | jp = 「鹿目さんと一緒に初詣をして、お団子を買って…
入院していた頃は考えられなかったなぁ…
…うんっ！せっかくのお正月だもん
今日は、目一杯楽しまなきゃ…！」 | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Akemi Homura (Megane ver.)|Akemi Homura]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

page.title: How Will Our Luck Be This Year?

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = まどか「これが…『究極おみくじ』…ほむらちゃん、どう？」
ほむら「えと…『巨大吉』だって。鹿目さんは？」
まどか「私は『無限大吉』！ねぇ、せーので見せ合いっこしようよ」
まどか＆ほむら「せーの！」 | en = Madoka: "This is...'Ultimate Fortune' -Homura-chan, how about you? Homura: "Um...'Huge Fortune'. And Kaname-san's?" Madoka: "I'm 'Infinite Luck'! Hey, let's show each other on the count of three." Madoka & Homura: "One, two, three!" | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Akemi Homura (Megane ver.)|Akemi Homura]] and [[Kaname Madoka (Haregi ver.)|Kaname Madoka]]. *When purchased from the [[Happy New Year at the Mizuna Shrine!]] event shop, this memoria comes Max Limit Broken and Level 35.

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「世界が暗闇に染まれば光を灯し、世界が光だけなら影を与える
こうして存在というものが生まれることが認識されるという救い
私は魔法少女もそうでない人々にも光と影を与え続ける
悲しみに彩られた人々は私の手によって解放されるのよ」 | en = "If the world bears into the darkness, light the world and it will also make a shadow. I recognize that and thus I am a magical girl. So I will continue to bring both light and shadows to those who are not magical girls, who are filled with sorrow, and they will be released by my hands." | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Holy Mami]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 同じメロディーを分かち合いながら静かに過ぎゆく時間の中で、
淡い色をした感情が、彼女の胸を高鳴らせる
「ありがとう、さやか」と、言ってくれるその言葉だけで十分だから、
嬉しくて恥ずかしくて、これ以上何もできない自分がもどかしい | en = In a time that quietly passes while sharing the same melody, a pale-colored feeling makes her breasts ring. Saying "Thank you, Sayaka" is just enough for that word, I am happy and embarrassed, I can not do anything more I feel frustrated | na =Time slowly passes by, all while sharing that same melody... A muted emotion resounds in her chest. "Thank you, Sayaka," he says, and that is just enough for her. Delighted and embarrassed, she can't bring herself to do anything more... how frustrating }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = Sayaka: "I'll leave it to you!"
Kyoko: "You're not supposed to be killed by small fry!"
Sayaka suddenly, this margin~!
Kyoko: "Heh, that's my buddy!"
Sayaka: "Ok, I'll go all the way to the end!" | jp = さやか「そっちは任せたよ！」
杏子「そっちこそ、雑魚なんかにやられるんじゃねえぞ！」
さやか「よっと、こんなの余裕余裕～！」
杏子「へっ、さすがあたしの相棒じゃん！」
さやか「よーし、そんじゃ最後まで一気にいっちゃうよー！」 | na = Sayaka: "I'm leaving this one for you!"
Kyoko: "Don't you go gettin' yourself killed by these losers, ya hear!?
Sayaka: "Please, they're nothing!"
Kyoko: "Heh! I guess you ARE mi partner, after all!"
Sayaka: "All right, let's give it all we've got until the very end!" }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Miki Sayaka]] and [[Sakura Kyouko]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = あたしはさ、自分の大切な人が幸せだったらそれでいいんだ。
その人の笑顔を見るだけで、あたしまで笑顔になれるんだもん。
だから、あたしは自分のためには戦わない。
あたしだけは大切な人のために戦い続ける！ | en = I do not mind, if my precious person is happy. Just seeing that person's smile makes me smile until the end. So, I will not fight for myself. I will continue to fight for important people only! | na = As long as my closest friends are happy, that's enough for me. Just a smile from them is enough to bring a smile to my own face. So I don't fight for myself. I fight for those who are dear to me, and I always will! }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Miki Sayaka]]. [[Category:Memoria]]

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 感謝の気持ちを込めてひとつひとつ
ドキドキワクワクと、ちょっぴりの不安
でも、大好きな人たちの喜ぶ顔が見たいから…
大切な…大切な人たちは喜んでくれるかなぁ…？ | en = Enveloping the emotion of thankfulness bit by bit,
my heart became throbbing and excited, with a bit of anxiety.
But, I'd like to see the happy face of the one I love...
Will the important...important person be pleased...? | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Isuzu Ren]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus choco bars amount each battle for the [[À La Carte Valentine ~Delivering Everyone's Feelings~]] event. ** Normal: Gain +1 Bonus choco bars ** Max Limit Break: Gain +5 Bonus choco bars

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 物心ついて恋をして、星が巡って巡り来る年に１度のバレンタイン
淡い気持ちを抱いたまま、あとどれだけこの日を迎えられる？
って、考えてしまうから、大切にしなくちゃいけない
この日も想いもチョコレートも…だって… | en = While you are in love with a sense of mind, holding this pale feeling of a once a year Valentine when the stars come around, how much more can we hold on to this day? Because I think, I have to cherish this day, the thoughts and the chocolate...after all. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Miyako Hinano]] and [[Kisaki Emiri]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus choco bars amount each battle for the [[À La Carte Valentine ~Delivering Everyone's Feelings~]] event. ** Normal: Gain +3 Bonus choco bars ** Max Limit Break: Gain +7 Bonus choco bars

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「同じような悲劇を、もう誰にもあわせたくありません
だから私…魔法少女になる
どうか、この手に
…フランスに光をもたらす力を！」 | en = "I don't want anyone else to have to experience a tragedy like this again
So I... I will become a magical girl
Please, give me
...the power to bring light to France!" | na = I don't want such a tragedy to ever happen again, to anyone. That is why... I will become a Magical Girl. Please bestow upon me the power to bring light to France! }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Tart]].

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = Kyubey, a strange existence who can only be seen by those who believe in it like Melissa who is devoted to Tart, who made the battlefield flag of "Angel-sama" and believed in the testimony of the angel... | jp = キューブは、信じる者にしか見ることができない不思議な存在
純粋なタルトは、その光輪こそが天使のあかしと信じ
“天使様”の旗を掲げて戦場を馳せる
タルトに心酔するメリッサもまた、同様… | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Saint's Medal amount each battle for the [[The Chiming Bell that Transcends Time]] event. ** Normal: Gain +1 Bonus Saint's Medal ** Max Limit Break: Gain +5 Bonus Saint's Medal

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = かけがえのない命を贄として、運命の歯車は動きはじめた
そしてふたりの少女が、ひとつの墓前に誓いを捧げる
ひとりは、必ずこの国を救うことを
ひとりは、そんな彼女を必ず守り助けることを… | en = Sacrificing an irreplaceable life, the gear of fate began to move.
Between the two girls who gave an oath to one grave,
one was determined to save this country,
and the other was determined to protect and help such a girl... | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = "I will never let it go away, Beyond the many tears and mistakes that I've finally met, I finally met my last hope: It's Tart so she's finally the light of hope I've met at the end of the journey." | jp = 「決して消させはしない
幾度もの涙と過ちを越えて、ようやく出会えた最後の希望
それがタルトだから
彼女は旅路の果てに、ようやく出会えた希望の光だから」 | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Tart]] and [[Riz Hawkwood]].

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「メリッサ！ダメよ前線に出てくるなんて！」
無謀な行動に出た彼女を、魔法の矢が貫こうとしていた…
目を開けた彼女が見たのは、自身をかばう“乙女”の背中
次の瞬間…世界は、希望の光を失った | en = "Melissa! Don't come out on the front!" A magical arrow was trying to penetrate her in reckless action ... She opened her eyes, she saw her "girl" on her back and the next moment ... The world lost the light of hope | na ="Melissa! I told you not to come to the front line!" A magical arrow flew toward the girl after she rushed recklessly ahead. When Melissa opened her eyes, she saw La Pucelle, who had thrown herself in front of her to protect her. And in an instant, the world lost its light of hope. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Tart]] and [[Melissa de Vignolles]].

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「タルトの進む道はこの国のみんなにとって
希望の光になるんだって…そう思ったから
たとえ…この先にどんな運命が待っていようとも
私も魔法少女として共に戦います！」 | en = "The way Tart is going will be the light of hope for everyone in this country... Even though... I thought so... even if any destiny awaits you will also fight together as a magical girl!" | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Tart]], [[Melissa]], and [[Riz Hawkwood]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Saint's Medal amount each battle for the (Event Name) event. ** Normal: Gain 3 Bonus Saint's Medal ** Max Limit Break: Gain 7 Bonus Saint's Medal

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore |en = At a church named after the namesake saint of her sister "Catherine"
They met a lone alchemist
What they recieved from her was the magical sword "Clovis", once given to the founders of the nation
The unbroken strands of fate are spun yet again... |jp = 妹と同じ名を持つ聖人“カトリーヌ”の名を冠する教会で
出会ったひとりの錬金術士
彼女が授けたのは、魔力を帯びし建国の祖“クロヴィス”の剣
連綿たる因果が、またひとつ紡がれる… |na = At a church bearing the name of her younger sister Catherine, she met an alchemist who presented her with Clovis, the first king of the Franks' enchanted sword. Thus, another thread of fate was added to her destiny. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

page.title: A Fine Day to Cool Down

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = "Can't believe that Alina's reading the manga fool girl's reading... Alina doesn't know why it looks so colorful although it's in monochrome. Actually, Alina knows the reason for sure." | jp = 「まさかフールガールが読んでる漫画をアリナが読むなんて…
ホント、理由なんて分からないケド
モノクロのはずなのに、カラーになって見えるワケ
それは何故かって、アリナが一番よく分かってるんですケド」 | na = For I, Alina, to be reading the same comic that idiota reads? Ridicolo... The reason escapes me. But the monochrome panels appear as if they are in full color, and I, Alina, understand why better than any other. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Alina Gray]].

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「生の美、死の美、滅びの美、アリナのテーマは“アリナの美”
アリナがゾックゾクしたものを、アリナは勝手に作るダケ
見たいならみせてアゲル。そして、勝手にゾックゾクしちゃってヨネ
きっとブレインがサイケデリックでブリリアントになるカラ」 | en = "The beauty of life, the beauty of death, the beauty of ruin, the theme of Alina is 'the beauty of Alina'. Alina makes you shudder with fear, and if you happen to see Alina unexpectedly, show her some praise. And then, she will surely make your shuddering brain brilliant with psychedelics, you know" | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Alina Gray]].

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「どうしてこうなったのって言われると
ややこしすぎて、説明できそうもないんだけど…
元はと言えば…多分、みたまさんの勘違いから
始まったんだと思う…」 | en = "It's too confusing when we try to explain what happened, but speaking of the source... I think that it started with a misunderstanding from Mitama-san..." | na = I don't think I could even try to explain how we got there. It's too complicated for words. I suppose you could say it all started with Mitama and a little misunderstanding of hers. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Tart]], [[Nanami Yachiyo]], and [[Tamaki Iroha]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Saint's Medal amount each battle for the [[The Chiming Bell that Transcends Time]] event. ** Normal: Gain +3 Bonus Saint's Medal ** Max Limit Break: Gain +7 Bonus Saint's Medal

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 全てが色あせたなら、それは自分の色が失われたから
このまま自分の色が無くなるのなら
最後に全てを彩ろう
自らを捧げて | en = If everything has faded, it is because my color was lost
So if my color disappears like this
I will color everything in the end
If I dedicate myself | na = If all colors seem faded, that means I have lost my color. If my color must fade, then I shall enliven everything for that final moment by sacrificing my very self. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * This memoria features [[Alina Gray]] * [https://strangeremains.com/2014/06/24/body-of-a-courtesan-in-nine-stages-a-19th-century-study-of-decomposition/ "Kusouzu (九相図)" are pictures of the nine stages of a decaying corpse. ]

page.title: The Sunlight That Shines Into the Complex

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 団地にある公園は、三人がいつも集まる場所
学校帰りにおしゃべりしたり、時にはピクニックみたいなことも
そういう時は、三人はゆっくりとした穏やかな時間を味わっている
暖かい光を浴びながら、れいらが持ってきたお菓子を味わいつつ… | en = The park in the housing complex is a place where the three people always meet.
They chat after school, and sometimes hold something like a picnic.
At such times the three taste the slowly and gently flowing time.
Under the warm light, they tasted the sweets that were brought by [[Ibuki Reira|Reira]]... | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Aino Mito]], [[Kumi Seika]] and [[Ibuki Reira]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Nut From the Tree of Secrets amount each battle for the [[Bye_Bye%2C_See_You_Tomorrow|Bye Bye, See You Tomorrow]] event. ** Normal: Gain 3 Bonus Nuts From the Tree of Secrets ** Max Limit Break: Gain 7 Bonus Nuts From the Tree of Secrets

page.title: The Way Home after the Rain (Mito)

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 雨の日って、ちょっと気分がしょんぼりって人、多いよね
でも、こうやって…バッシャーン！
水たまりに飛び込んだりすると、楽しいんだよ！
足元？もちろんビシャビシャ！でも「やったぞー！」って気分！ | en = On rainy days, people are a bit nervous, but they do it like this ... SPLASH! Jumping into a puddle is fun! With my feet? Of course splishity-splash! But I feel like "I did it!" | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Aino Mito]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Nut From the Tree of Secrets amount each battle for the [[Bye_Bye%2C_See_You_Tomorrow|Bye Bye, See You Tomorrow]] event. ** Normal: Gain 3 Bonus Nuts From the Tree of Secrets ** Max Limit Break: Gain 7 Bonus Nuts From the Tree of Secrets

page.title: The Way Home after the Rain (Seika)

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 今朝から降り続いていた雨も、放課後にはようやく晴れて…
うん、気持ちがいいな、雨上がりって…
これで虹でも架かってたら…れいらとみとに言ってみようかな…
『あの虹に向かって走ろうよ！』って…！青春っぽくないかな？ | en = The rain that had been coming down since this morning is finally sunny after school. Yes, it feels good, after the rain... If you bridge a rainbow with this... I'll try to say to you... "I'll run toward that rainbow!" Isn't it youth? | na = It was raining all day, but the sun finally came out after school. It feels so nice after it rains. If I see a rainbow, maybe I should say something to Reira and Mito? Something cheery and fun like, "Let's run and find the end of the rainbow!" }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Kumi Seika]].

page.title: The Way Home after the Rain (Reira)

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 雨の日の帰り道、こういう時は決まって…
ほら、みとが水たまりに飛び込んだ！そこを予想してガード！
ふふ～！もう慣れっこだもんね！次は私もやってみようかな…!?
それにしても、こういう時、自然に避けてるよね～、せいかは…！ | en = On the way home on a rainy day, this time is fixed ... Hey, Mito jumped into the puddle! Guard the anticipation there! Hehe~! she's already accustomed! Next time I will try to do it ...! Even so, at this time I avoid it naturally ... Seika will...? | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Ibuki Reira]].

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = コーヒー、コーラ、オレンジジュース、今日は何が飲みたい気分？
パスタ、ピラフ、オムライス、今日は何が食べたい気分？
ちょっと気持ちが沈んだときは、ちょこっと顔を覗かせて
いつでも最高の笑顔でお出迎えするから（セガコラボカフェ記念） | en = Coffee, cola, orange juice, what do you feel like drinking today? Pasta, pilaf, omelet, what do you feel like eating today? When your feeling somewhat sinks, I will welcome you with a smile of the best with a peek at my face for a while (Sega Collaboration Cafe Memorial) | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * This memoria features [[Nanami Yachiyo]], [[Akemi Homura (megane)]], [[Tamaki Iroha]] and [[Kaname Madoka]].

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 毎日を楽しく過ごすために大事なのは、何よりも笑顔！
笑顔が笑顔を呼べば、その輪はどんどん広がっていくはず！
だから、今日も元気に笑顔で「いらっしゃいませー！」
（ローソンコラボ記念） | en = The most important thing for having fun every day is a smile! If a smile brings about another smile, the cycle will continue on and on! So today once more with a smile full of energy, "Welcome!"(Lawson Collaboration Memorial) | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Mitsuki Felicia]], [[Futaba Sana]], [[Nanami Yachiyo]], [[Tamaki Iroha]] and [[Yui Tsuruno]].

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 小さい頃から団地で一緒に暮らしているれいら、せいか、みと
一緒にバタバタと階段を駆け上がったり駆け下りたり！
あの頃は大きいと感じていた一段も、今では普通に足をかけている
変わっていくこともあるけれど、三人は変わらず、今も友達…！ | en = Reira, Seika and Mito, who have been living in the residential complex together since childhood,
are clattering up and down the stairs!
The stairs that used to seemed so big for them are just normal under their feet now.
Some things have changed, but the three of them haven't. They are still friends even now...! | na = Leika, Seika and Mito have lived together in this apartment complex since they were little and always loved racing up and down the stairs! Those steps felt so huge before, and now they walk them so easily. The world may get smaller, but their friendship keeps growing! }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Aino Mito]], [[Kumi Seika]] and [[Ibuki Reira]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Nut From the Tree of Secrets amount each battle for the [[Bye Bye, See You Tomorrow]] event. ** Normal: Gain 1 Bonus Nut From the Tree of Secrets ** Max Limit Break: Gain 2 Bonus Nuts From the Tree of Secrets Limit Break: Gain 2 Bonus Nut From the Tree of Secrets

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = これは自分で買ったものでしょ…
これはせいかからで…あ、これはみとからもらったもの！
そんな感じでキーホルダーを全部つけた私の家のカギ！
ちょっと大きいけど…カワイイからいっかな！ | en = This one I bought myself...
This one was from Seika... ah, and this is the one Mito gave me!
So that's basically why I put all those keyrings on my house key!
It's a little big... but it's cute, so it's fine! | na = Now, this one I bought myself. This one Seika got for me, and this one's from Mito! That's why I have all these keychains on my house key! It's kind of big now, but it's cute, so it's fine! }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 家族とれいらとみとしか知らない、私の密やかな趣味…
それは…青春熱血スポ根好き！そして、これが私のコレクション！
映画、ドラマ、小説、漫画、アニメ…もちろん、実際のスポーツも！
どこかに私みたいな人がいたら、緊張せずに話せるかも…!? | en = My secret hobby which only the family and friends know, ... It is ... youth spirit sprout love! And this is my collection! Movie, drama, novels, manga, animation ... Of course, real sports too! If there is someone like me somewhere I may be able to speak without being nervous ...! | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 私ね、頭の中で色んな想像をするのが大好きなんだ～！
楽しいし、自由だし、いつでもできるし！
思いついた生き物とかは、ノートに絵を描いてるの！
ほら、これ！見て見て！ちょっとした『みと動物園』でしょ？ | en = I love to imagine so many things in my head~!
It's fun, free, and you can do it anytime!
The creatures I come up with are drawn in pictures in a notebook!
Hey, this! Look, look! A little "Mito Zoo", right? | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「…といった由来がある貴重な作品です。…ふぅ、噛まずに言えました」
美術品に関わりたくて始めた美術館のアルバイト
慣れないことも失敗してしまうこともあるけれど
夢に近づくため、少女は与えられた仕事を今日も頑張る！ | en = "...It is a valuable work derived from... I managed to said without stuttering."
She started her part-time job at an art gallery where she could have something to do with arts.
Though sometimes she fails at it,
in order to get closer to her dreams, the girl will do her best at work today, too! | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This Memoria features [[Kozue Mayu]].

page.title: I Can Make a Serious Face Too, You Know?

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「普段は、莉愛ちゃんに『ほわほわしてる』とか
『そんなんだから、変な男に付け込まれるのよ！』
なんて言われる私だけれど、美術に向き合っているときだけは
莉愛ちゃんもびっくりするほど真剣な顔なのだそうです」 | en = "Usually Ria-chan says 'You're so howa-howa' or 'You usually end up with strange men because of what you're like!' That's what I'm told, but it seems Ria-chan is surprised at my serious face when I am faced with art." | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Kozue Mayu]].

page.title: A Dream to be an Art Conservator

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = Repairing an artwork that has become hazy is a little similar to unraveling a hazy memory of a father who is no longer there, a father whose memory is almost unnoticed. This girl will regain the appearance of this artwork. | jp = 傷み霞んでしまった美術品を修復することは
おぼろげな記憶を紐解くことに少しだけ似ている
今はもういない父、ほとんど記憶にない父
その背を追いながら少女は美術品の姿を取り戻していく | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = チャリン…これは１円の音…チャリン…これは50円の音…
チャリン…これは10円の音…チャリン…これは５円の音…
チャリン…これは１円の音…チャリン…こ、これは…ご、500円の音!!
ひみかには分かる。その些細な違いが | en = CLINK... This is the sound of 1 yen...
CLINK... This is the sound of 50 yen...
CLINK... This is the sound of 10 yen...
CLINK... This is the sound of 5 yen...
CLINK... This is the sound of 1 yen... CLINK... Th-this is... the sound of 500 yen!!
Himika understands it. That trivial difference | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 何をしても戦えず…誰かに頼ることでしか生きられず…
願いが叶ったかどうかも分からぬまま…朽ちようとしていた…
その耳に囁きかけるのは、救いの言葉か呪いの言葉か…
「八雲みたま、アナタもまた那由多の呪いを願った魔法少女だね」 | en = No matter what I do, I can't fight... I could only live by relying on someone. I don't even know if my wish was fulfilled or not... I was going to decay... Whispering in that ear is the words of salvation or the words of a curse... "Yakumo Mitama, you are also a magical girl who wished for the curse of many." | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Yakumo Mitama]].

page.title: Assistant Instructor of the Ryuushin Style

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = "As the acting master of Ryuushinryuu (True-Dragon style), it is my duty to protect and promote the dojo, and as one with power, it is my destiny to defeat evil and bring justice. I will not forgive acts of evil!" | jp = 「伝統ある“竜真流”の師範代であるからには
道場を守り、盛り上げていくことがつとめであり
力あるものとして悪を討ち正義を成すことも私の使命
悪行は許しません!!」 | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This Memoria features [[Tatsuki Asuka]]. *The Memoria name is misspelled as "Asisstant" on the NA server.

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = | jp = 集まった人々がみつめるのはただひとり
この美貌に歓声を、この気高さに喝采を
舞い踊る光さえ弾いて輝くのはこの私！
超絶美少女・阿見莉愛様ただひとり!! | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This Memoria features [[Ami Ria]].

revision.comment: a minor edit in na official translation... just a few minutes after adding it myself.  something minor that I just overlooked in the grammar.

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 届かない…どうしても届かない！
どんなに努力を重ねても一番に届かなかった少女はもういない
叩き割られた鏡に映るのは、絶世の美少女…
砕けた鏡の中でさえ褪せない美しさを持った少女だ | en = | na =She wasn't even close to the top... But the girl who could never reach her goal no matter how hard she tried is no more. An unrivaled beauty is reflected in the shards of a shattered mirror. Her allure does not fade, even when beheld in shards of broken glass. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 名前を書いてこのお守りにしまっておく
そうすると、ずっと忘れずに一緒にいられる…
あの人が教えてくれたおまじないを、私は今でもやっている
それは、あの人を忘れないためでもあるから… | en = Write a name and keep it in this amulet
Then, we'll stay together without forgetting...
I am still using the charm she taught to me
in order not to forget her... | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

page.title: Wishing for Power to Not Lose

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 強い者が勝つ、弱い者は負ける…これは世の中のルールだ
アタシは弱かったから、いつでも負ける側だった
だから力が欲しかった…誰にも屈しない力が！
やがて私が、ゲームオーバーになる前に… | en = The strong win and the weak lose... that is the rule of the world.
Because I was weak, I was always on the losing side.
That's why I wanted strength... the strength to not give in to anyone!
It wasn't long until I got a game over... | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

page.title: The Witch, the Wolf, and the Villager

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = ある村を人に化けた狼が襲った時、心の優しい魔女が現れた
魔女は村の窮地を救うが、村人たちは保身からこの魔女を追放する
善意が悪意を駆逐するが、新たな悪意によって善意が駆逐された
この魔女はいずこかで同じことをするのか、それとも… | en = When a village was attacked by a wolf in human's clothing, a kindhearted witch appeared.
The witch helped the village out, but villagers banished the witch for the sake of self-protection.
Kindness eliminates malice, but by new malice, kindness was eliminated.
Does the witch repeat the same thing somewhere else, or... | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

page.title: The Sword Which Strikes in the Space Between Light and Dark

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 少女の足下に見える夜の神浜市には、煌びやかな灯りが彩を加えている
光と闇の交錯…それは人と人ではない者たちとの交錯のようだった
少女は手に持つ刃をもって、常なるこの交錯を断とうとしている
たとえ誰にも理解されることはなくても、彼女がそう決めたから… | en = In Kamihama City at night as seen through the feet of the girl, a sparkling light adds to its color.
The intersection of light and dark... It seems like an intersection between humans and non-humans.
With a blade in her hand, the girl is trying to sever this regular intersection.
Even if no one understands her, that is what she decided... | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Amano Suzune]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Suzune Medals amount each battle for the [[Cross Connection]] event. ** Normal: Gain 3 Bonus Suzune Medals ** Max Limit Break: Gain 7 Bonus Suzune Medals

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「やっば！超美味しい！やっぱり買って正解でしょ！」
「あのねアリサ…どーして我慢できないの!?」
「いーじゃん、食べたかったから！…で、チサトは食べないの？」
「…え？…それは…ん～…まぁ…一口だけもらっていい？」 | en = | na = "Knew it! Tastes like heaven! Good thing I bought one!"
"Arisa, can I ask you something? Do you know the meaning of the word restraint?!"
"Who cares! I wanted it, so I got it! You wanna try some, Chisato?"
"What?! Umm, well...maybe just one bite?" }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Suzune Medals amount each battle for the (Event Name) event. ** Normal: Gain 1 Bonus Suzune Medal ** Max Limit Break: Gain 3 Bonus Suzune Medals

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = “願い”によって力を手に入れて、その力に酔いしれた
周りを見渡すといつの間にか誰もいなくて、やっぱりひとりぼっち…
何も変わらないと思っていた日々を救ってくれたのは
手を差し伸べてくれたこの人だった… | en = | na = I used my wish to get strong, and got drunk on that power, I demolished everyone around me. Before I knew it, I was all alone with no one to rely on. But someone saved me from those endless days of nothingness- the girl who reached out to grab my hand. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This Memoria features [[Narumi Arisa]].

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = “願い”によって壊れてしまった父さんを理想の父さんに変えた
でもそれは、絵本作家の夢を父さんから奪うことでもあった
人知れずその罪悪感で苦しんでいた私の心を軽くしてくれたのは
手を繋ぐことができたこの人だった… | en = | na = I used my wish to turn my broken father into a perfect parent, but that wish stole away his dream of being a picture book author. I was wracked with hidden guilt, but eventually someone helped relieve some of that burden—the girl who took my hand. }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = | jp = 静かになった教室に飛びこんでくる風が、心地良く髪を撫でる
黄昏は夜の喧騒や、魔女と争う茨への誘いではなくなったらしい
証明している…この穏やかな心が証明しているから…
だから振り払ってみせよう、どれだけ過去が追いかけてきても… | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Yukino Kanae]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Ghost License amount each battle for the A Voice From Beyond That Strokes the Ears event. ** Normal: Gain 5 Bonus Ghost Licenses ** Max Limit Break: Gain 10 Bonus Ghost Licenses

page.title: Now the Two of Us Watch Over
A Thing That Talks in Place of Me

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = うわさの中の遊園地、その中には定番名物メニューがある
クツクツと煮えたアツアツの素材をホフホフしながらみんなで食べると
どれだけイヤーな感情も、湯気と一緒にフワッと飛んでいく
だけど、どうして鍋なのか？それは管理人にも分からないらしい | en = Within the amusement park inside the rumor, there is a popular specialty on the menu.
Eating the hot foods in boiling broth together makes any bad feeling you might have float away with the steam.
But why is it a hot-pot? Seems like not even its manager knows. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = この時の彼女には後悔はなかった
かつて住んでいた家にも、かつて通っていた仲間たちの所も
あるのはただ、新たな憩いの地を盛り上げること
迷いはなかった、一切合切において… | en = | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This Memoria features [[Yui Tsuruno]].

page.title: Tension Between the East and West
Reconciliation Between the East and West

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = ケンカの仲裁、紛失物の捜索、醤油染みの消し方etc…
困り事なら、愛はなくとも筋は通す律儀なメイド
「なぎたんにお任せ、だぞっ！ご主人」
（しかし、この光はどこから降ってきているんだ？） | en = Arbitrating quarrels, searching for lost items, erasing soy sauce stains, etc...
If you are troubled, a honest maid will solve it without care through muscle force
"You can leave it to Nagitan! Master."
(But I have to wonder, where does that light come from?) | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Izumi Kanagi]].

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = | jp = それは次第に、人の想いに隔たりを作った…
それは次第に、亀裂を生んでいった…
それは次第に、人々を別れさせていった…
強靱な心は時に乖離を生む。救いに縋らない者はひとりになった… | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Izumi Kanagi]], [[Azusa Mifuyu]], [[Amane Tsukuyo]], and [[Amane Tsukasa]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Parfait amount each battle for the [[Newbie Maid Carefree Kanagi]] event. ** Normal: Gain +3 Bonus Parfait ** Max Limit Break: Gain +7 Bonus Parfait

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = Newbie maid Izumi Kanagi is wearing brand new maid clothes
Her cool profile and calm movements leave no room for disrespectful tone
Sporting generally maid-like appearance and a plain attitude
Nevertheless, people are drawn to that peculiar aura of hers | jp = 真新しいメイド服に身を包むのは駆けだしメイド十七夜
クールな横顔、悠々とした動作、不遜ともとれる口調
おおよそメイドさんらしからぬその態度
しかし、その独特な雰囲気こそが人々を引き付ける | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Izumi Kanagi]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Parfait amount each battle for the [[Newbie Maid Carefree Kanagi]] event. ** Normal: Gain +1 Bonus Parfait ** Max Limit Break: Gain +3 Bonus Parfait

page.title: I'll Repeat It No Matter How Many Times It Takes

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「この水着さ、一目見て気に入ったんだよね～」「いいんじゃねーの」
「ホントにそう思ってんの～？」「思ってるって」
「杏子、アイス食べるのに夢中じゃん！」「どうしたの？」
「マミさん！あの…」「どうしたの？じっと見て…」「…反則だよ！」 | en = | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Tomoe Mami]], [[Miki Sayaka]], and [[Sakura Kyouko]].

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「えと…これ…どうかな？鹿目さん…」
水着も日傘もサンダルもトータルでコーディネイト！
思い切ってちょっと派手めでチャレンジしてみたほむら
ちょっと冒険してみるのもいいかも…だって夏なんだし!? | en = "Kaname-san... Um... what do you... think of my outfit?"
The swimsuit, sandals and parasol are completely coordinated!
Homura who tried the challenge of being bold and a bit flashy.
It might be okay to be a little adventurous since it's summer!?" | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Akemi Homura (Mizugi ver.)]]. *Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Memory Seashells (Red and Blue) amount each battle for the [[The Crescent Moon Manor's Summer Vacation]] (2019) event. **Normal: Gain 3 Bonus Memory Seashells (Red and Blue) **Max Limit Break: Gain 7 Bonus Memory Seashells (Red and Blue)

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = From the umbrella standing in the hallway, droplets telling about the rain stopped a while ago dropped down.
Petrichor together with the fragrance of night jasmine from the outside crossed her nose.
The gleam of the setting sun went into sight and dyed everything white
to the extent that the boundary between reality and unreality became hazy. | jp = 玄関に立てた傘からは、さっきまでの雨を物語る水滴がしたたる
外からはペトリコールと共に夜香花の匂いが鼻先をかすめる
夕日の煌めきが視界に入り込み、すべてを白く染める
現実と非現実の境界までがぼやけてしまうほどに | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = みんなで楽しくビーチバレー！…だと最初は思ってた…
試合は徐々に白熱し、マミさんの超本気な強烈なスパイクが炸裂！
その行き先は…ほむらの顔面!?焦るマミ！驚きで身動きできない一同！
彼女の眼鏡は宙に舞い、夏の日差しに照らされてキラキラ輝いていた… | en = Fun beach volleyball with everyone!...Or so I thought at first...
As the match gradually came to the climax Mami-san's Ultra Serious Strong Spike burst through the air!
Its' destination was... Homura's face!? Mami is shocked! The astonishment has made everybody stop still!
The girl's glasses spun flying through the air, while the rays of sunlight made them glitter with sparkle... | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This Memoria features [[Tomoe Mami]], [[Kaname Madoka]], [[Miki Sayaka]], and [[Akemi Homura (Mizugi ver.)]]. *Note that this Memoria casts a [[Debuff]] on its own user.

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = Taking a short break from the blazing rays of sun
Leaving aside the swimming ring just this time
As I peacefully watch at the waves washing over the beach, I relish in this restful moment
...Ah, look! There's a giant cloud spreading out in the sky! | jp = 照りつける日差しから逃れて、ちょっと休憩
この時ばかりは浮き輪たちともちょっとお別れして
静かに吹き抜ける風を感じながら、ゆっくりとした時間を味わう
…あ、見て！あんなに大きな入道雲が広がってるよ！ | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「ほらほら鶴乃～！食らいやがれー！」
「あ～！やったなフェリシア～！」
「（う、海では皆さんとこうやって遊ぶんですね…！）」
この後、全力で水をかけまくり、ふたりからの反撃に遭うさなだった… | en = "Over here, Tsuruno~! Take this!!"
"Hey! Now you've done it, Felicia~!"
"(S-so you have fun with everyone at the beach by playing around like this...!)"
Later, Sana received a combined counterattack from Tsuruno and Felicia after splashing water at them with all her power... | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Mitsuki Felicia]], [[Futaba Sana]], and [[Yui Tsuruno]].

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = By coincidence, we found this lovely spot for taking a break!
Quickly, we prepared black tea and sweets for ourselves.
...This spot is really perfect for taking breaks!
We'll invite all of our friends next time! (T-Card Collaboration Memoria) | jp = 偶然見つけた素敵な場所！
手際良く紅茶とお菓子の準備をしたら
とっておきの休憩スポットが完成！
せっかくだから、友達をたくさん誘っちゃおう（Tカードコラボ記念） | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = I didn't know that there was such a lovely place with warm sunshine and open space like this at the place where my friends invited me to come!
It looks like everyone from Mitakihara will arrive soon.
(T Card Collab Commemoration) | jp = 友達に誘われて訪れた場所は、陽だまりのぽかぽかとした空間
こんなに素敵な場所があるなんて知らなかった！
見滝原のみんなはもうすぐ到着するみたい
ふたりでお迎えに行こう！（Tカードコラボ記念） | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

revision.comment: HOOCCOOH moved page [[The Treasure is Here]] to [[The Treasure Is Here]]

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = ひとりの少女の前に引かれた線…それは彼女の“願い”
それを踏み越えた時、彼女はこの世界に別れを告げる
数多の魔法少女を救うため、数多の因果を受け止めて
やがて彼女は生まれ変わる…“希望”そのものへ | en = A thread drawn in front of a single girl... That is her "wish".
When she made it through, she bade farewell to this world.
To rescue a myriad of magical girls, and to accept a myriad of karmic destinies.
Soon she would be reborn... to "hope" itself. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Kaname Madoka]] and [[Ultimate Madoka]].

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 繰り返し紡いだ糸　ひとつの点に重なって
重ねた約束と共に　数多を救う約束の光になる
新たな幕開けは少女の闇　囁いた言葉が　少女を掬い上げた
「あなたはわたしの、最高の友だちだったんだね」 | en = The repeatedly spun threads overlap on a single point,
together with the promise, they become the light of the promise that will save the multitude.
In the new beginning of the girl's darkness, these whispered words scooped her up out of it.
"You were my best friend, weren't you?" | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

page.title: The Light of Hope Without Despair

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 宇宙を作り出すほどの希望は
宇宙を終わらせるほどの絶望をもたらす
希望はいずれ絶望し、全てを呑み込む魔女となる
それを滅ぼすのは、絶望することのない希望の光だ | en = The hope enough to create a universe brings despair enough to end a universe.
Hope turns into despair anyway, and becomes a witch that devours everything.
It is the light of hope without despair that will destroy it. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = Twilight will not be a sad time anymore; never will our efforts be in vain again.
The girl, whose ribbon is gently swaying, offers a glimpse at a brighter future.
She offers this to you along with everyone, but she wants to experience it with you at once.
"It's still too early to give up!"... that's right. So I won't give up as well. | jp = 黄昏時は悲しくない　決して虚しくもない
髪に揺らめくこのリボンが、あなたを側に感じさせてくれるから
みんなと一緒にいるあなた　だけど私はすぐそこにあなたを感じている
“諦めるのはまだはやい”…そうだったね　だから私も諦めないよ | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = The warmth conveyed from the overlapped hand and hand tells us that
it's okay, we are not alone,
and, I wish that one day...
all the anxiety of this warmth to melt. | jp = 重ねた手と手から伝わるぬくもりが教えてくれる
大丈夫、私たちはひとりじゃないって
そして、いつの日にか…
このぬくもりが抱える不安全てを溶かしてくれますように | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Tamaki Iroha]] and [[Nanami Yachiyo]].

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = みんなのことを知っているはずなのに、知らない
起きていることは分かっているはずなのに、分からない
このレコードはイレギュラー、特異点を持つ不思議な記録
壊さないように消さないように、そのまま悪さはしないで | en = It should be that I know everyone, and yet there is someone I know nothing of.
It should be that I understand everything when I awoke with this power, and yet there is something I understand nothing of.
This record is irregular; the world within this singularity must hold mysteries I yet know of.
So in order not to destroy this world, and so as not to erase it, I cannot interfere. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = それは、願いと奇跡の物語
神浜と見滝原、過去と未来、希望と絶望…そして救い
いくつもの出会い、いくつもの因果が紡がれ、重なり合うたびに
つながってゆく、もうひとつのストーリー（コミカライズ記念） | en = A story of wishes and miracles
Kamihama and Mitakihara, past and future, hope and despair... and salvation
One more story where countless meetings, countless fates spin and connect as they come together (Comic Commemoration) | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

page.title: I Won't Forgive You If You Open It

text.#text:
{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「み、見た!?見てないよね!?
え…………何を、って？
もちろん、撫子の部屋のクローゼットだよ！
開けたら絶対に許さないから」 | en = "You, you already saw it!? You didn't see it right!?
Huh... See what?
Of course, the closet in Nadeko's room!
I won't forgive you if you open it." | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This Memoria features [[Sengoku Nadeko]].

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = Parallel worlds, parallel routes.
A world in which monsters exist, a world where there are miracles and magic.
When the two worlds that should not have overlapped intersect...
a new story begins. | jp = パラレルなワールド、パラレルなルート
怪異の存在する世界、奇跡も魔法もある世界
重なりあうはずのないふたつの世界が交差するとき…
新たな物語が走り出す | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Senjougahara Hitagi]] and [[Kaname Madoka]].

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「…え、宿題？
どうしてせっかくの楽しい休みの日に
宿題みたいな大変なことをしなくちゃいけないの？
勉強はしたいときにすればいいんだよ」 | en = "...Huh, homework?
Why do I have to do anything so bothering like homework
on the precious holiday?
It's fine to study whenever I want." | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This Memoria features [[Sengoku Nadeko]].

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = ぶきっちょなわたしでも
“理想のお姉さん”にもらったこの包丁があれば
どんな料理だって作れる気がしてくる！
お煮しめ、肉じゃが、きんぴらごぼう…どれから作ろうかな？ | en = | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = いつもニコニコ笑顔で、お店をテキパキお手伝いして
会うと元気がもらえるって評判の子は
工匠区のお弁当屋さんにいる看板娘
「お待たせしました！当店自慢の唐揚げ弁当ですっ！」 | en = | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = がんばれた時に一緒に喜んだり、寂しい時に一緒に居たり
わたしがお姉さんにしてもらったことを、この子にもしてあげたい
いつかわたしを、自慢のお姉さんだって
思ってくれたら嬉しいな… | en = When I persevered through, she was happy with me, and when I was lonely, she was there for me.
What I received from her, I want to give that to this child, too.
If she thinks of me as a sister that she can take pride in someday,
That would make me very happy... | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | en = Painful memories, imitations of me, minions, witches...
After waking up from the horrible dream, now everything faded to the faraway opposite side.
Here live the powerful and gentle elder sisters.
I became a magical girl and knew it, an important place of ease. | jp = 辛い記憶、自分の偽者、使い魔、そして魔女…
怖い夢から目が覚めた今は、すべてが遠く彼方
ここにいるのは強くて優しいお姉さんたち
魔法少女になって知った、心安らげる大切な居場所 | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}}

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 心に芽吹いていた不安はもう消えた
忘れちゃいけない大切なことも思いだした
焦らないし、不安にもならないし、怖がったりだってもうしない
遠くても一歩ずつ近付いてみせる。“理想のお姉さん”に！ | en = All anxieties in my heart were blown away.
The important thing which shouldn't be forgotten came to my mind.
I am not hurry, anxious, or fearing anymore.
I'll accomplish the long journey step by step too. To become a "Ideal elder sister"! | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This Memoria features [[Chiaki Riko]].

{{ {{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 「うんうん…今、神浜が大騒ぎなのは知っているのです！
この百江なぎさにぜーんぶお任せなのです！
カッチコチにハードなトラブルも、チーズのようにトローッと解決！
…って、い、今、なぎさが原因だって言ったのは誰なのです～!?」 | en = | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} *This memoria features [[Momoe Nagisa]]. * Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Coupon amount each battle for the [[Momoe Nagisa's Wish Was Granted]] event. ** Normal: Gain 3 Bonus Coupon ** Max Limit Break: Gain 7 Bonus Coupon

text.#text:
{{{{PAGENAME}} |Stats}} {{MemoriaLore | jp = 何度、敗北を味わおうとも。幾度、地に塗れようとも
彼女は再び立ち上がり、見滝原に災厄をもたらす魔女に立ち向かう
それは、彼女がまだ希望を求めているから
絶望を乗り越えて運命に抗うことを…想いを諦めていないから | en = How many times will the girl taste defeat? How many times will the ground be covered with blood?
She continually resets everything from the beginning, each time hoping to gain a new outlook on how to defeat the witch who will bring calamity.
Her powers never seem to grant her wish each and every time,
but she will keep on overcoming the hopelessness she feels and fight against fate itself—therefore she can't even think of giving up. | na = }} {{MemoriaTrivia}} Each Memoria equipped grants a bonus Memory Sand amount each battle for the [[Beginning and Eternal ［The Lost Record］]] event. Normal: Gain 2 Bonus Memory Sand Max Limit Break: Gain 5 Bonus Memory Sand
